entries.femaleVariant: <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% damage</> when outside of Combat. Also provides a preview of estimated damage.

Unlocks <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Focus</> mode. This mode automatically activates when you aim while at full Stamina.

When active:
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Time is briefly slowed</>, allowing for more accurate shots.

When it ends:
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">-{float_1} Stamina</>

<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Duration:</> {float_0} sec.

<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% weapon swap speed</>\n\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_1}% Stamina</> when swapping during combat.

While <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Deadeye</> is active, damage no longer falls off at large distances. Instead, \n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">damage increases up to {float_0}%</> (reached at {float_1} meters).
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">-{float_0}% Firerate</> for semi-automatic weapons.
While in Combat Headshots and hits to Weakspots are <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">always Crit Hits.</>
Hip-firing does not consume Stamina.\n\nWhen above {float_1}% stamina <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">you move +{float_0}% faster</>

Allows you to perform <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Finishers from a greater distance</>.

Each hit with a thrown weapon also makes them more susceptible to Finishers.

To perform a Finisher, press <Input context="InteractionActions" actionName="Choice1" color="MainColors.Blue" hold="Hide"></> when an enemy's Health is low.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% crit chance</> decreasing as stamina does.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">No movement speed penalty</> with Heavy Weapons such as Machine Guns and Sniper Rifles.

<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Enemy armour is reduced by -{float_0}% for {float_1} seconds </>after you shoot them.\n\nDismemberment spreads the effect to nearby enemies.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% Sprint speed</>

Blocking an attack gives:\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% Stamina</>\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_1}% damage</> with Melee Weapons for {float_2} sec.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">-{float_0}% incoming ranged damage</> when blocking.
The <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Attack speed</> penalty at low stamina no longer applies to you.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% melee damage</>.

<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% damage</> for the next Quick Melee Attack after shooting an enemy.\n\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_1}% damage</> for the next shot after hitting an enemy with a Quick Melee Attack.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+Refills {float_0}% ammo</> in the currently equipped weapon after neutralizing an enemy.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">-{float_0}% Stamina cost</> for attacks with melee weapons.
Unlocks the ability to <Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">block incoming projectiles</> with melee weapons. This consumes Stamina.
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% attack speed</> with melee weapons.

<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Each {float_0}th hit deals {float_1}% bonus damage.</>
The count resets after {float_2} seconds.
One, Two...

Swapping weapons is faster and automatically reloads them.\n\n<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">+{float_0}% fire rate</> after swapping. Normal reloading ends the effect.
Rest Easy
<Rich color="TooltipText.cyberwareDescriptionHighlightColor" style="Semi-Bold">Stamina begins to regenerate sooner</> the more stamina you have left.
Weighted Vigor
